    • placeholder

      public SELF placeholder(net.minecraft.text.Text placeholder)
      Description copied from interface: AbstractTextFieldWidgetBuilder
      Sets the placeholder text for the text field widget. The placeholder is shown in the text field in gray when it is empty.
      Specified by:

    • placeholder

      public SELF placeholder()
      Description copied from interface: AbstractTextFieldWidgetBuilder
      Sets the placeholder for the text field widget to the default translatable text. The translation key will be reconfigure.property.[namespace].[propertyname].placeholder. The placeholder is shown in the text field in gray when it is empty.
      Specified by:
      placeholder in interface AbstractTextFieldWidgetBuilder<SELF extends AbstractTextFieldWidgetBuilder<SELF>>
      Returns:
      The builder for chaining
